tweet.text: On Feb. 5, 2003, Sec. Powell addressed the United Nations Security Council, presenting “Iraq’s Failure to Disarm” regarding compliance with UNSC Resolution 1441. Remarks: https://t.co/qRKMfN0pQB Slides and Videos: https://t.co/xXJU9aqnQS https://t.co/PQWuSTKDzx
